text: Sincerely appreciate this update from @AAPneonatal and @Lilylouuuuu on #COVID-19 #vaccine during #pregnancy and #lactation - an important question for many healthcare workers now. The morbidity from #COVID19 is significantly higher during pregnancy. Graphic abstract of MMWR Nov 6 https://t.co/9ZyzX8Dj1i https://t.co/YLL7wLCgI0
